textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: The ocean seems to be getting more crowded these days\n and these mines don't help one bit! Be careful out there!\n

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 The suck ability is especially helpful for Eddie because
 he's slow. Park yourself near a tasty school of fish then 
 take a deep breath!
